com.teamten.font

Class FontManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamten.font.FontManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PdfBoxFontManager

    public class FontManager
extends Object
    Loads and manages fonts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FontManager(Function<TypefaceVariant,Font> fontLoader)
      A font manager that creates new fonts from the specified font loader.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Font get(Typeface typeface, FontVariant fontVariant)
      Utility method that calls get(TypefaceVariant) with a new TypefaceVariant object created from the two parameters.
      SizedFont get(Typeface typeface, FontVariant fontVariant, double fontSize)
      Utility method that calls get(TypefaceVariantSize) with a new TypefaceVariant object created from the two parameters.
      Font get(TypefaceVariant typefaceVariant)
      Fetches a font.
      SizedFont get(TypefaceVariantSize typefaceVariantSize)
      Fetches a font, returning the font and size together.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FontManager

        public FontManager(Function<TypefaceVariant,Font> fontLoader)
        A font manager that creates new fonts from the specified font loader. The font loader should throw an IllegalArgumentException if the font cannot be loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Font get(TypefaceVariant typefaceVariant)
        Fetches a font. The first time this is called for a particular font, the font is loaded.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the font cannot be loaded.

      • get

        public SizedFont get(TypefaceVariantSize typefaceVariantSize)
        Fetches a font, returning the font and size together.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the font cannot be loaded.

      • get

        public Font get(Typeface typeface,
                FontVariant fontVariant)
        Utility method that calls get(TypefaceVariant) with a new TypefaceVariant object created from the two parameters. TODO can eventually delete.

      • get

        public SizedFont get(Typeface typeface,
                     FontVariant fontVariant,
                     double fontSize)
        Utility method that calls get(TypefaceVariantSize) with a new TypefaceVariant object created from the two parameters.
